common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Call this API to fetch all the campaign setting info under this Shop.

error_list.name: ads.shop.campaign_not_match
error_list.description: Invalid campaign ID for this shop.

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: ads.api.http_method_not_allowed
error_list.description: Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_partner_api
error_list.description: Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_shop_api
error_list.description: Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_api
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Info type values: 1.Common Info 2.Manual Bidding Info 3.Auto Bidding Info 4.Auto Product Ads Info

","name":"info_type_list","sample":"1,2,3,4","type":"string","required":"True","key":"iJbcQYH"},{"description":"

list of campaign ids comma separated (max 100 campaign ids)

","name":"campaign_id_list","sample":"11111,22222,33333","type":"string","required":"True","key":"JxnkNzb"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Error code, empty when no error returned

error description

request id is unique for each request

response body

","name":"shop_id","sample":"121212","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"QbyNsBB"},{"description":"

","name":"campaign_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"RCRYna","children":[{"description":"

The unique ID per campaign

common_info body

auto, manual

","name":"ad_type","sample":"auto","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WFyMBE"},{"description":"

the name of each ad

","name":"ad_name","sample":"name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"skwTAnY"},{"description":"

ongoing, scheduled, ended, paused, deleted, closed

auto, manual

search, discovery, all

","name":"campaign_placement","sample":"all","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WHAPyFN"},{"description":"

The budget per campaign. Please kindly note that if the campaign budget = 0, it means the budget set for this campaign is unlimited

","name":"campaign_budget","sample":"12.50","type":"float","required":null,"key":"YFXCYZa"},{"description":"

the duration per campaign

","name":"campaign_duration","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"mPaQMkm","children":[{"description":"

The start date for each campaign. please kindly note that if this campaign is no end date, please pass today's date as the start date 

","name":"start_time","sample":"1234567890","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GKXADRy"},{"description":"

the end date per campaign. please kindly note that if it's no limit, so you don't need pass anything and if it's unlimited, the end time would return 0

","name":"end_time","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HxynPhP"}]},{"description":"

List of unique identifiers for all products under this campaign. If the campaign is using auto product selection it can have between zero and many products. If the campaign is using manual product selection, it has exactly one.
